name: Don't Touch The Zombies
description: Enjoy a different and twisted way for playing zombie games.Play as hunter exploring mazes full of zombies for a zombie slaughter, but be careful, only touch one of them and you will swap roles.Play as zombie to chase the hunter and start the hunting again.
